description: AdCP Sales Agent Demo - Two-window Claude.ai-style chat with artifacts + live dashboard for Adform executive demonstration

userStories.title: Project setup with Next.js and Express
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the project scaffolded with Next.js frontend and Express backend so I can build the demo application.
acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14 app created in src/frontend with App Router
TypeScript configured for both frontend and backend
Both frontend and backend can start without errors
package.json scripts for dev, build, start

userStories.title: Load mock data layer
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the mock data loaded from data/adcp_demo_complete_data.json so tools can access it.
acceptanceCriteria: Data loader module created in backend
JSON data loaded on server startup
In-memory state for updates during demo

userStories.title: Implement get_products tool
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need the get_products tool to discover available advertising inventory.
acceptanceCriteria: Tool accepts optional category and max_cpm parameters
Returns products array with product_id, name, description, category, pricing_options
Returns all products when no filters

userStories.title: Implement list_creative_formats tool
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need the list_creative_formats tool to get available ad format specifications.
acceptanceCriteria: Tool accepts optional type parameter (display, video, native, audio)
Returns formats array with format_id, name, type, dimensions, specs
Returns all formats when no filter

userStories.title: Implement list_authorized_properties tool
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need the list_authorized_properties tool to get accessible publishers.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns properties array with property_id, name, domain, category, monthly_uniques

userStories.title: Implement create_media_buy tool
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need the create_media_buy tool to launch new campaigns.
acceptanceCriteria: Tool accepts brand_name, product_id, budget, targeting, start_time, end_time
Creates new media buy in mock data

userStories.title: Implement get_media_buy_delivery tool
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need the get_media_buy_delivery tool to get performance metrics.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns single media buy metrics when id provided
Returns all media buy metrics when id omitted
Includes total_budget, total_spend, pacing, health, summary, by_device, by_geo, recommendations

userStories.title: Implement update_media_buy tool
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need the update_media_buy tool to modify existing campaigns.
acceptanceCriteria: Tool accepts media_buy_id and updates object
Supports adjust_bid with device and change_percent

userStories.title: Implement provide_performance_feedback tool
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need the provide_performance_feedback tool to submit conversion data.
acceptanceCriteria: Tool accepts media_buy_id, feedback_type, and data object

userStories.title: Add WebSocket broadcasting
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Socket.io broadcasting so both windows can sync state.
acceptanceCriteria: Broadcasts initial_state event on client connect

userStories.title: Create REST API endpoints for tools
userStories.description: As a developer, I need REST API endpoints that wrap the tools so the frontend can call them.

userStories.title: Create chat page layout with 40/60 split

Comparison queries go to artifact panel
